scripts.start:server-dev: concurrently "npm start" "cross-env FLASK_ENV=development FLASK_APP=./backend/app.py flask run"
scripts.start:server-prod: rm -rf ./backend/templates && rm -rf ../backend/static && npm run build && cross-env FLASK_ENV=production FLASK_APP=./backend/app.py flask run
scripts.build: react-scripts build && mv build ../backend && mv ../backend/build/static ../backend && mv ../backend/build ../backend/templates
